Literature.Title: Antibacterial and Antibiofilm Activities of Novel Antimicrobial Peptide DP7 against the Periodontal Pathogen Porphyromonas gingivalis.
Literature.Author: Jiang SJ, Xiao X, Zheng J, Lai S, Yang L, Li J, Liu C, Yang Y, Mu Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>1280 µg/ml,Human periodontal ligament cells:LC50=>64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=32->128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8-32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ABA1(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ABA2(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAU2(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAU7(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ECO1(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ECO2(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAER1(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAER10(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus S5375(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAU5(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAER7(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAER4(MIC=16µg/ml),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(MIC=8µg/ml),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(MBC=32µg/ml)
